memoryHowToPlayPop.step1: When the game starts, you will see a grid of cards with fruits on them. To start the game, click on the 'Start Game' button.
memoryHowToPlayPop.step2: Once the game starts, you can click on any card to flip it over and see the fruit. You can flip over two cards at a time.
memoryHowToPlayPop.step3: If the two cards you flipped over have the same fruit, they will stay flipped over and you will earn a point.
memoryHowToPlayPop.step4: If the two cards you flipped over do not have the same fruit, they will flip back over after a short delay.
memoryHowToPlayPop.step5: Your goal is to match all pairs of cards as quickly as possible. The game ends when all pairs have been matched.
